website_summaries.verdict: Nice mix of price and performance in a product that holds up well under regular use.
pros: Available in either black or red colors
Doesn't come to a point behind the knee, and some catchers like the feel of this 4-sided design
Very reasonable price point for this type of gear
D-shaped loops are large enough to make it easy to affix the knee protector to the shin guards
cons: D-shaped loops are made of plastic instead of metal, so they won't last as long

customer_reviews.title: Item not compatible with Louisville Slugger gear
customer_reviews.text: We bought these with the Louisville Slugger catchers set because it was recommended and wanted knee savers for my daughter. Only one problem. As you can see from the photo the clips on the skin guards CANNOT pass through the loops on the knee savers. A product shouldn't be listed to be purchased together that won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric I.

customer_reviews.title: They really save her knees!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter wears these when she catches for her softball team. She is using them with the Louisville Slugger Series 5 Intermediate Catcher's Gear that we also bought on amazon and they work great. She is able to have more support behind her knees when she is squatting. I was worried about the wear and tear on her knees playing catcher, I feel these help a lot. She is able to pop up quicker and she plays a lot more innings as catcher without feeling fatigued I would recommend these knee savers and would certainly buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Choate

customer_reviews.title: Small is sufficient for 9 year old girls
customer_reviews.text: I thought the loops were medal but they're plastic. It's tricky to get the straps from the shin guards through the knee savers' loops but I suppose this is a good thing so when the shin guards are removed from the catcher's legs, the pads don't fall out easily. The pads themselves seem sturdy and I hope it lasts until my daughter outgrows it. Bought her the small size and she is 9. The other catchers on her team use this and they all think it's more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product, really helpful for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Fit easily and have worked well for my 9 year old son, though he is almost 5 ft and 100 pounds. Don't know if the smaller ones would have fit his catchers gear but these were perfect since his gear is a little bigger than the normal 9 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Ibburnk18cnu

customer_reviews.title: Makes catching stance more bearable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 11 year old son to use with a Mizuno catching set. These were very easy to attach to the set, and my son has loved having these on the set. He caught last year as well, and said these are so much more comfortable for him to use while catching. I am sure these are doing great things for his knees by distributing more of the weight off of the knees.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: The Easton brand knee savers are awesome. Our coach bought a different brand and we ...
customer_reviews.text: The Easton brand knee savers are awesome. Our coach bought a different brand and we struggled with them so much they never stay on and they started ripping quickly. They are easy to use with the d clips and quick to put and my son loves them. They support him more than some of the others brands. I would recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: FixItDaddy

customer_reviews.title: These DO fit Louisville Series 5 gear - Here's how to attach them.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, and despite another person's comment that these don't fit the Louisville Series 5, they do. You can't get the clasp through the d-ring on the knee savers as this reviewer shows in his review picture, but all you have to do is remove the strap from the catcher's gear, thread it through the knee savers, and reattach the strap to the gear. Simple. My son is 10 and we purchased the small savers and they are just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: These knee savers made a huge difference! My son loves being catcher for his team but complained that he was uncomfortable while catching. After researching for a while I decided to get the knee savers and he loves them. He was a catcher for 4 games this weekend and didn’t complain once! Definitely a great buy! He is 8 yeas old.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Small knee saver
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, knee savers. They work perfect for our 9 year old son and with them, he is now squatting instead of kneeling. The only thing about them, at no fault of the product, is that our son does not always use them and they become bulky calf bulges. Perfect size, and great support or so we are told.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: My son didn't like the shape of these
customer_reviews.text: My son didn't like the shape of these. He said they got in the way of his movement and would prefer not using them at all over using them. He's used the triangle shape and said they feel better. These didn't even make it through a whole game. We've since given them away.
customer_reviews.author: cbarrett37

customer_reviews.title: One thing is i think he had them on backwards at first and then switched them and they were much better. But they could be a mat
customer_reviews.text: These work fabulously for my 10 yr old boy! He loves them and they fit well. One thing is i think he had them on backwards at first and then switched them and they were much better. But they could be a matter of 'men not reading directions' more than bad construction!
customer_reviews.author: Whit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young catchers!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing knee savers! They have added a new level to my little girls time behind the plate.. she’s ready! Perfect fit and accessory to any Catchers kit..
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: A bit too big and bulky for an 8U player
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 8 year old daughter (4'3" 61 lbs). Though they work, they are a bit bulky and probably a bit too large for her. They slide around when she walks, so she ends up walking like a robot with them on. I wish there was a way to keep them stable on the strap so they wouldn't slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend for 8u
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t recommend for 8u. My 7 year old couldn’t even squat down with them on and hated Them. She’s 49” 47 pounds. I like the product and they work, just not for her small size
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Too much hassle
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to get clipped on & kept coming undone - my kid was spending more time fiddling with them than catching so we took them off!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Brouse

customer_reviews.title: Quality large pads, with small loops.
customer_reviews.text: Large too big for 5’7” male. Loops are too small to get strap hooks through. I’m not sure if that is by design or not, but it’s a pain. Good durable quality pads though.
customer_reviews.author: Zach the Outdoor Addict

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic rings
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe they now use cheap plastic rings instead of what you would expect, metal rings... i am also annoyed that no straps were included.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My kid loved having these on his pads. They help him with his knees and was able to pop up faster.
customer_reviews.author: Fiktishes

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Got these fo my 9 year old son who is now catching. He doesn’t have Easton gear, so we had to do a little work for these to fit his gear. After a few minutes we got it and they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chilli

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These fit great for my petite 14 year old using large child catchers gear. Seems to hold up well so far. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: michelle m

customer_reviews.title: Not bad wish it came with some attachments
customer_reviews.text: These pads will not stay on. Fall off in the middle of a game, wish they had clips to add or something otherwise they are great

customer_reviews.title: Great for the size and $
customer_reviews.text: We bought them for our 8 yr old daughter. Her knee was bothering her until she started using them. The other girls on the team like them as well.

customer_reviews.title: nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had these when I was a kid catching. Makes it a lot nicer for the knees. May need to cross the bottom two straps in between the loops if your kid is on the smaller/younger side yet.

customer_reviews.title: Performance enh
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, comfortable to use, and gave additional Ballance in stance that results in a quicker response to the ball and added confidence.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My daughter is 11 and they fit her great. She is about 5 ft. They have rings on the back so they strap on with any gear for catching.

customer_reviews.text: Strapped these on my son and the second he squattedbdown he said "these are really comfortable". Good product and great price.

customer_reviews.title: However invented then is a genius
customer_reviews.text: Gotta use them. Saves the knees, if I had them when I was a kid I’d still be able to walk.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats but they didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the way they fit and looked. However, he is a catcher and they only last about 8 games before the soles cracked in the center from him being a catcher. NOT worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT YOUTH
customer_reviews.text: Completely misadvertised. By youth they mean grown teenagers with man sized legs. These will not work for catchers smaller than 5'6" 150lb. Completely dissatisfied. Never got them on the field but I missed Amazon's "Return Window" so I guess I will wait 4 years until my 9 year old grows into them.

customer_reviews.text: These are great...but they don't really attach (without rigging something up) to the Wilson youth EZ Gear Catchers Kit because of the Velcro straps on the shin guards.

customer_reviews.title: A simple product that works as stated. My son ...

product_meta.title: EASTON KNEE SAVER Catchers Knee and Leg Support, Four Sided Cradle Design Provides Support, Comfort, Protection, and Lightweight, Reduces Stress and Erosion of Knee Joint Cartilage
feature_bullets: Four-sided cushion cradle design provides maximum support, comfort, and protection
Reduces stress and erosion of cartilage of the knee joint
